text: Jerusalemi kumapima mani'naza vahe'mo'za karagi neru'za ne'zama nesaza zankura tusiza hu'za hake'naze. Ana nehu'za ne'zama nene'za ofri kasefa'ma hu'za manisnagura, knare'nare feno zazamia vahe nezami'zage'za, nona'a ete ne'za zami'naze. Hagi Jerusalemi kumamo'a mago akna hu'neankino amanage huno hu'ne. Ra Anumzamoka nagrira nazeri haviza nehazanki, nago huno hu'ne.
